structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIIIA. SOUTH FLORIDA CULTURAL CONSORTIUM

text.section:
Sec. 2-300.14. Reports.
The Consortium shall, in February of each year during the term of this article, report to the County Commission of each of the participating counties as to the past and proposed activities of the Consortium. In addition, copies of all agendas and of minutes of each Consortium and Executive Committee meeting shall be furnished to the County administrator or Manager and the County Attorney or general counsel of each party.
